snippet: The huge summer blockbuster was only his second-best film of the year.
abstract: Gaby Dunn article contends that Joss Whedon film The Avengers, huge summer blockbuster, was his second-best film of the year, coming in behind The Cabin in the Woods, meta-horror film he co-wrote.
lead_paragraph: The huge summer blockbuster was only his second-best film of the year.

headline.main: Joss Whedon Made a Masterpiece (and Also ‘The Avengers’)
headline.print_headline: Joss Whedon Made a Masterpiece (and Also ‘The Avengers’)
